title: Cannot integrate any external app
author: OmisNomis
body_snippet:
<!-- Bug -->
I have tried integrating Powershell ISE, Powershell, MinTTY, Git Bash and CMD and none of them are integrating; instead, they open a separate window. 

Have searched extensively and cannot find an answer to this.
|--:|---|
|Operating system | Windows 10 x64 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75 aplha 3  |

iterations.description: External apps (PowerShell, cmd, Git Bash, mintty) cannot integrate into mRemoteNG panels because IntegratedProgram relies on Process.MainWindowHandle which returns IntPtr.Zero for console apps and child-process-spawning apps — a long-standing integration gap confirmed by multiple users over 7+ years

notes:
AI triage: External apps (PowerShell, cmd, Git Bash, mintty) cannot integrate into mRemoteNG panels because IntegratedProgram relies on Process.MainWindowHandle which returns IntPtr.Zero for console apps and child-process-spawning apps — a long-standing integration gap confirmed by multiple users over 7+ years
Approach: Implement an IExternalAppIntegrator strategy pattern with specialized handlers for well-known apps (cmd, PowerShell, mintty via -d flag, Git Bash) that use alternative window-handle discovery (EnumChildWindows, FindWindow by class, or app-specific embedding flags) instead of relying solely on Process.MainWindowHandle polling
